items.title: Awesome Sre
items.content_text:
### Culture

*   [Reliability Engineering ‚Äì The Essential Discipline for Complex Systems](https://vimeo.com/344515149)

### Education

*   [Do you have an SRE team yet? How to start and assess your journey](https://cloud.google.com/blog/products/devops-sre/how-to-start-and-assess-your-sre-journey)
*   [How SRE teams are organized, and how to get started](https://cloud.google.com/blog/products/devops-sre/how-sre-teams-are-organized-and-how-to-get-started)

### Books

*   [What is SRE?](https://www.verizondigitalmedia.com/e-book/oreilly-what-is-sre/)
*   [Engineering Reliable Mobile Applications: Strategies for Developing Resilient Native Mobile Applications](https://landing.google.com/sre/resources/practicesandprocesses/engineering-reliable-mobile-applications/)

### On-Call

*   [Better On-Call the SRE way](https://vimeo.com/344516642)

items.title: Awesome Swift
items.content_text:
### Network / Barcode

*   [Just (‚≠ê1.4k)](https://github.com/dduan/Just) :penguin: - HTTP for Humans (a python-requests style HTTP library).

### UI / Barcode

*   [MultiSlider (‚≠ê516)](https://github.com/yonat/MultiSlider) - UISlider clone with multiple thumbs and values, range highlight, optional snap intervals, optional value labels, either vertical or horizontal.

### Button / Barcode

*   [RadioGroup (‚≠ê191)](https://github.com/yonat/RadioGroup) - The missing iOS radio buttons group.

UI / Barcode

items.title: Awesome Decentralized
items.content_text:
### Applications

*   [Pleroma](https://pleroma.social): Federated social networking server built on open protocols. It is compatible with GNU Social, Mastodon, and many other ActivityPub and OStatus implementations.
items.content_html:
Applications

  • Pleroma: Federated social networking server built on open protocols. It is compatible with GNU Social, Mastodon, and many other ActivityPub and OStatus implementations.
